info.name: Sign of the Ram Astral Sign

description.p: The Sign of the Ram, depicting the mighty and steadfast ram, depicts tenacity. An astrologer connected to this sign is able to stand firm against those who would try to knock you down.
At 1st level, you gain proficiency with with medium and heavy armour, martial weapons, and the Athletics skill.
At 1st level, you gain an additional Cosmic Alignment option.

Earth Alignment. Make a weapon attack. On a hit, you can end a Cosmic Ritual and spend a number of star points up to the maximum number you can spend to cast a spell. For each star point you spend, you deal an extra 1d8 radiant damage to the target, to a maximum of 6d8.

At 1st level, whenever you take damage, you can use your reaction to reduce that damage by an amount equal to 1d10 + half your astrologer level (rounded up). You can use this feature even while you're incapacitated, but not unconscious.
You can use this feature a number of times equal to your Intelligence modifier (a minimum of once). You regain any expended uses when you finish a long rest.

sheet.description: Whenever you take damage, you can reduce that damage by 1d10 + {{level:astrologer:half:up}}. You can use this feature even while you're incapacitated, but not unconscious.

description.p: At 6th level, your strikes can move boulders. When you hit a creature with a weapon attack that deals bludgeoning damage, you mark it until the end of your turn. If you use your Star Alignment against a marked creature while you're within 5 feet of it, it's pushed an additional 5 feet away from you and takes bludgeoning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier. If you're outside, you can push it a further 15 feet.

description.p: At 10th level, you are immovable. You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws to avoid being knocked prone, grappled, restrained, or otherwise moved against your will.

sheet.description: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws to avoid being knocked prone, grappled, restrained, or otherwise moved against your will.

description.p: At 14th level, you can invoke the strength and durability of aries to empower your defenses. As an action on your turn, you gain resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 minute. When you take damage of one of those types, you can use your reaction to gain immunity to that type of damage, including against the triggering damage. If you do so, the resistances end, and you have the immunity until the end of your next turn, at which the immunity ends.
Once you use this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.
